requirements.text: Create a hero section with headline 'Powering the Future of Energy', subheading 'Advanced Lithium & EV Battery Solutions', and a 'Contact Us' call-to-action button that scrolls to the contact form

quotes: Hero Section: Headline: Powering the Future of Energy, Subheading: Advanced Lithium & EV Battery Solutions, Call-to-action button: Contact Us

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays the exact headline and subheading text
Contact Us button is prominently displayed
Button smoothly scrolls to the contact section when clicked

requirements.text: Create an About section with a brief description explaining that EVARON provides high-performance, durable and safe battery solutions for EVs and solar systems

quotes: About Section: Brief description about Evaron providing high-performance, durable and safe battery solutions for EVs and solar systems

acceptanceCriteria: About section includes descriptive text about EVARON's battery solutions
Text emphasizes high-performance, durability, and safety
Section mentions both EV and solar system applications

requirements.text: Create a Products section displaying three product cards: 'EV Lithium Battery', 'Solar Storage Battery', and 'Industrial Battery Pack', each with appropriate visual presentation

quotes: Products Section: Show 3 product cards: - EV Lithium Battery - Solar Storage Battery - Industrial Battery Pack

acceptanceCriteria: Three distinct product cards are displayed
Each card shows the correct product name
Cards are visually consistent and well-organized
Layout is responsive across screen sizes

requirements.text: Create a 'Why Choose Us' section highlighting four key benefits: 'Long Life Cycle', 'Fast Charging', 'High Safety Standards', and 'Energy Efficient'

quotes: Why Choose Us Section: - Long Life Cycle - Fast Charging - High Safety Standards - Energy Efficient

acceptanceCriteria: All four benefits are displayed clearly
Each benefit is presented with consistent styling
Section is visually distinct from other sections

requirements.text: Create a Contact section with a form containing Name, Email, and Message fields, and implement form submission handling in the backend to store contact inquiries

quotes: Contact Section: Include contact form (Name, Email, Message)

acceptanceCriteria: Contact form displays Name, Email, and Message input fields
Form validates required fields before submission
Form data is successfully submitted to the backend
Backend stores contact inquiries with timestamp
User receives visual feedback on successful submission

requirements.text: Create a professional footer displaying the company name 'EVARON'
acceptanceCriteria: Footer is present at the bottom of the page
Footer displays 'EVARON' company name
Footer styling is consistent with overall design

requirements.text: Apply a modern, clean corporate design with a black, orange, and white color scheme throughout the website, using bold headings and professional layout

quotes: Design Style: Modern, clean, corporate look. Color theme: Black, orange and white. Use bold headings and professional layout

acceptanceCriteria: Primary color palette uses black, orange, and white
Headings use bold font weights
Overall design appears modern and professional
Layout follows corporate design principles with clear hierarchy

requirements.text: Ensure the entire website is fully responsive and displays correctly on both mobile and desktop devices

quotes: Make it responsive for mobile and desktop

acceptanceCriteria: Website adapts to mobile screen sizes without horizontal scroll
All sections are readable and functional on mobile devices
Desktop layout makes effective use of larger screen space
Navigation and interactions work smoothly on both mobile and desktop
